import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Navbar } from "../index"; import "./Claim.css"; const Claim = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ step: 1, claim_ID: "1", claim_username: "", claim_userSSID: "", claim_usertel: "", claim_email: "", product_type: "0", claim_parcelID: "", claim_des: "", claim_bankaccount: "0", bankAccount: "0", claim_banknum: "", claim_bankholdername: "", claim_bookbank: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSelectChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleBankChange = (input, e) => { if (input === "claim_bankaccount") { const value = e.target.value; if (value === "6") { setFormData({ ...formData, [input]: value, bankAccount: "" }); } else { setFormData({ ...formData, [input]: value }); } } else { setFormData({ ...formData, [input]: e.target.value }); } }; const nextStep = () => { setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, step: prevData.step + 1, })); }; const prevStep = () => { setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, step: prevData.step - 1, })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); // Log formData here axios .post("http://localhost:3333/claim", formData) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data); }) .catch((error) => { console.error(error); }); }; const { step } = formData; return ( <>
